subject: Running
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Someday, a runner with a prosthetic leg may challenge to run in the Olympics. In the meantime, there should be a way to infuse Oscar Pistorius’s spirit into all of us, within Olympic rules, of course.
snippet: Someday, a runner with a prosthetic leg may challenge to run in the Olympics. In the meantime, there should be a way to infuse Oscar Pistorius’s spirit into all of us, within Olympic rules, of course.
